Name: Column Auto-Suggester
Function: Recommends which columns to analyze, tag, or clean based on heuristics.

Name: Field Description Generator
Function: Auto-generates tooltips or descriptions for columns using AI or patterns.

Name: Auto-Insights Assistant
Function: Highlights trends, anomalies, or interesting patterns with summaries.

Name: Interactive Summary Panel
Function: Builds a dynamic dashboard panel (counts, charts, key stats).

Name: Smart Highlight Assistant
Function: Adds conditional formatting or flagging (e.g., high risk, outliers).

Name: Autocomplete for Filters
Function: Adds typeahead/autocomplete to filter boxes or column selectors.

Name: Search Helper Chatbot
Function: A simple NLP chat interface to generate filter queries or views.

Name: Column Importance Estimator
Function: Scores column importance based on variance, completeness, uniqueness.

Name: Row Explainability Assistant
Function: Uses AI to explain *why* a row might be flagged or important.

Name: Visual Tag Legend Generator
Function: Displays a color-coded tag/label legend to explain categories.
